meanings: the pressing need of the hour

meanings.meaning: a race to find a vaccine

examples.korean: Re-signing him should be the team’s #1 priority this offseason. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이번 오프 시즌에는 그와 재계약하는게 팀의 급선무야. DARAKWON
examples.english: Re-signing him should be the team’s #1 priority this offseason. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our immediate priority is to quell[subdue] disorder within the team. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 팀 내의 분란을 잠재우는 것이 급선무다 Neungyule
examples.english: Our immediate priority is to quell[subdue] disorder within the team. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Resolving the intra-party conflict is an urgent priority. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당의 내분을 수습하는 것이 급선무다 Neungyule
examples.english: Resolving the intra-party conflict is an urgent priority. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our most urgent priority is to find out where he is. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 급선무는 그의 소재를 알아내는 것이다 Neungyule
examples.english: Our most urgent priority is to find out where he is. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The most pressing agenda for our country is to solve the North Korean nuclear arms issue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리나라의 당면한 급선무는 북핵 문제의 해결이다 Neungyule
examples.english: The most pressing agenda for our country is to solve the North Korean nuclear arms issue. Add to Wordbook
